${ModID}:Pierce.NAME: Pierce
${ModID}:Pierce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Target takes !M! more attack damage for the rest of this turn.

${ModID}:WaterJet.NAME: Water Jet
${ModID}:WaterJet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard !M! card.

${ModID}:PoisonShard.NAME: Poison Shard
${ModID}:PoisonShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Enemy takes !aqualancemod:D2! magic damage at the start of their turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: magic damage at the start of their turn.

${ModID}:BattlemageShard.NAME: Battlemage Shard
${ModID}:BattlemageShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Whenever you attack this enemy, cause !aqualancemod:D2! HP loss.

${ModID}:CatalystShard.NAME: Catalyst Shard
${ModID}:CatalystShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Whenever you apply a debuff to this enemy, they lose !aqualancemod:D2! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Whenever it receives a debuff, it takes

${ModID}:AttunedShard.NAME: Attuned Shard
${ModID}:AttunedShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Enemy takes !M! aqualancemod:Magic damage whenever you shuffle your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yMagic damage whenever you shuffle your deck.

${ModID}:AntimagicShard.NAME: Antimagic Shard
${ModID}:AntimagicShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Enemy takes !M! aqualancemod:Magic damage whenever it applies a buff, debuff, or status card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yMagic damage whenever it applies a buff, debuff, or status card.

${ModID}:UnstableShard.NAME: Unstable Shard
${ModID}:UnstableShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Enemy takes !M! aqualancemod:Magic damage whenever you discard an aqualancemod:Sigil.

${ModID}:BloodLust.NAME: Blood Lust
${ModID}:BloodLust.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal damage, you deal !M! more damage until the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:BloodHasWater.NAME: BloodHasWater
${ModID}:BloodHasWater.DESCRIPTION: Deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard !M! card.

${ModID}:WaterWhip.NAME: Water Whip
${ModID}:WaterWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put an attack from your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Flurry.NAME: Flurry
${ModID}:Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage an additional time for each debuff on the target.

${ModID}:FlingDebris.NAME: Fling Debris
${ModID}:FlingDebris.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:WaveMotion.NAME: Wave Motion
${ModID}:WaveMotion.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Bonus: !aqualancemod:M2! damage.

${ModID}:IronWave.NAME: Iron Wave
${ModID}:IronWave.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL aqualancemod:Bonus: !aqualancemod:M2! Block.

${ModID}:ChillingWave.NAME: Chilling Wave
${ModID}:ChillingWave.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! aqualancemod:Frostbite. NL aqualancemod:Bonus: !aqualancemod:M2! aqualancemod:Frostbite.

${ModID}:RideTheWave.NAME: Ride The Wave
${ModID}:RideTheWave.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL aqualancemod:Bonus: !aqualancemod:M2! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
NL Apply !M! aqualancemod:Frostbite to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:WaterBlast.NAME: Water Blast
${ModID}:WaterBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Apply !M! aqualancemod:Soaked to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:PickOff.NAME: Pick Off
${ModID}:PickOff.DESCRIPTION: Base damage is !M! per enemy. NL Deal !D! damage to the enemy with the lowest HP.

${ModID}:Rapids.NAME: Rapids
${ModID}:Rapids.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, draw 1 card and randomly discard 1 card.

${ModID}:Fog.NAME: Fog
${ModID}:Fog.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Enemy deals !M! less damage this turn.

${ModID}:AllIn.NAME: All In
${ModID}:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose [E] next turn.

${ModID}:TacticalCombat.NAME: Tactical Combat
${ModID}:TacticalCombat.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal attack damage, gain !M! Block.
${ModID}:TacticalCombat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal damage, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Pressure.NAME: Pressure
${ModID}:Pressure.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! #yPressure per debuff on the target. NL Target loses HP equal to their #yPressure.

${ModID}:PommelParry.NAME: Pommel Parry
${ModID}:PommelParry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:CloudSigil.NAME: Cloud Sigil
${ModID}:CloudSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Gain !M! aqualancemod:Intelligence. NL Return this to your hand.
${ModID}:CloudSigil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL aqualancemod:Replenish. NL Gain !M! aqualancemod:Intelligence. NL Return this to your hand.

${ModID}:WhirlpoolSigil.NAME: Whirlpool Sigil
${ModID}:WhirlpoolSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:RainSigil.NAME: Rain Sigil
${ModID}:RainSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:PuritySigil.NAME: Purity Sigil
${ModID}:PuritySigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Exhaust !M! random status cards.
${ModID}:PuritySigil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Exhaust !M! random status or curse cards.

${ModID}:MarshSigil.NAME: Marsh Sigil
${ModID}:MarshSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:TsunamiSigil.NAME: Tsunami Sigil
${ModID}:TsunamiSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Deal !M! aqualancemod:Magic damage to ALL enemies for each aqualancemod:Sigil discarded this combat ( !aqualancemod:D2! damage).

${ModID}:SteamBlast.NAME: Steam Blast
${ModID}:SteamBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable.

${ModID}:SteamExplosion.NAME: Steam Explosion
${ModID}:SteamExplosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !aqualancemod:D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak, Hobble, and Vulnerable. NL Overextend 5.

${ModID}:JumpKick.NAME: Jump Kick
${ModID}:JumpKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has at least 3 debuffs, NL gain [E] , draw !M! card and discard !M! card.

${ModID}:PowerThrust.NAME: Power Thrust
${ModID}:PowerThrust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card. NL Discard a card next turn.

${ModID}:Reckless.NAME: Reckless
${ModID}:Reckless.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and aqualancemod:Intelligence. NL Lose !aqualancemod:M2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:Spray.NAME: Spray
${ModID}:Spray.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your entire hand.
${ModID}:Spray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Replenish. NL Retain. NL Discard your entire hand.

${ModID}:IceMastery.NAME: Ice Mastery
${ModID}:IceMastery.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you embed a aqualancemod:Shard, apply !M! aqualancemod:Frostbite.

${ModID}:Dash.NAME: Dash
${ModID}:Dash.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !M! cards. NL Overextend !aqualancemod:M2!.

${ModID}:Detonate.NAME: Detonate
${ModID}:Detonate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! aqualancemod:Magic damage to ALL enemies for each aqualancemod:Shard in the target (!aqualancemod:D2! damage). NL Remove all aqualancemod:Shards in the target.

${ModID}:Analyze.NAME: Analyze
${ModID}:Analyze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! aqualancemod:Intelligence per aqualancemod:Shard in the target.
${ModID}:Analyze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Replenish. NL Gain !M! aqualancemod:Intelligence per aqualancemod:Shard in the target.

${ModID}:ExploitOpening.NAME: Exploit Opening
${ModID}:ExploitOpening.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Put an attack card from your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Streamline.NAME: Streamline
${ModID}:Streamline.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Draw 1 card next turn.
${ModID}:Streamline.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Draw 1 card the next !M! turns.

${ModID}:Jettison.NAME: Jettison
${ModID}:Jettison.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Discard 1 card next turn. NL Apply !M! aqualancemod:Soaked.
${ModID}:Jettison.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Discard 1 card the next 2 turns. NL Apply !M! aqualancemod:Soaked.

${ModID}:Flak.NAME: Flak
${ModID}:Flak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block whenever you discard a card.

${ModID}:Speed.NAME: Speed
${ModID}:Speed.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and discard !M! card.
${ModID}:Speed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and discard !M! card.

${ModID}:FierceSkewer.NAME: Fierce Skewer
${ModID}:FierceSkewer.DESCRIPTION: Can only target enemies with at least !M! debuffs. NL Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:BloodBender.NAME: Blood Bender
${ModID}:BloodBender.DESCRIPTION: Deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage once for each aqualancemod:Shard in the target. NL Remove all aqualancemod:Shards from the target.

${ModID}:ColdHearted.NAME: Cold Hearted
${ModID}:ColdHearted.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:FlashFreeze.NAME: Flash Freeze
${ModID}:FlashFreeze.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Flow.NAME: Flow
${ModID}:Flow.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard any number of cards and draw that many. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WaterBurst.NAME: Water Burst
${ModID}:WaterBurst.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Replenish. NL Cause !aqualancemod:D2! HP loss !M! times.

${ModID}:Vortex.NAME: Vortex
${ModID}:Vortex.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card, deal !M! aqualancemod:Magic damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Escalate.NAME: Escalate
${ModID}:Escalate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, gain !M! aqualancemod:Intelligence.
${ModID}:Escalate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Replenish. NL Whenever you apply a debuff, gain !M! aqualancemod:Intelligence.

${ModID}:ElementalForm.NAME: Elemental Form
${ModID}:ElementalForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play or discard a card, deal !M! aqualancemod:Magic damage to a random enemy.
